scripts.start: rm -rf run && mkdir -p run && RMF_API_SERVER_CONFIG=sqlite_local_config.py poetry run python -m api_server
scripts.test:cov: poetry run python -m coverage run scripts/test.py
scripts.test:report: poetry run python -m coverage html && xdg-open htmlcov/index.html
scripts.lint: poetry run pyright && poetry run pylint api_server --ignore=ros_pydantic,rmf_api
